titles.title: Garden Valley Withdrawal Act
A bill to provide for the withdrawal of certain Federal land in Garden Valley, Nevada.
Garden Valley Withdrawal Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Garden Valley Withdrawal Act - Withdraws specified federal land in Garden Valley, Nevada, depicted on the map entitled Garden Valley Withdrawal Area, dated July 11, 2014, from: (1) entry, appropriation, and disposal under the public land laws; (2) location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (3) operation of the mineral leasing, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.
